title: Imaginary and complex number properties - extension

blocks.name: readdcnnred
blocks.content: The sum of a real number and an imaginary number is not a real number. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm readdcnnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(cc, cr)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wnel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)))
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, wnel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr)))
  df-nel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(cfv(cim, c0), caddc, cfv(cim, c1)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cim, c1), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(cfv(cim, c0), caddc, cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cim, c0), caddc, cfv(cim, c1)), cfv(cim, c1), co(nat0, caddc, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cim, c0), caddc, cfv(cim, c1), nat0, w0)
  reim0d(c0, w0)
  addid2d(cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  recnd(cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, w0)
  eqeq1d(cfv(cim, co(c0, caddc, c1)), nat0, co(cfv(cim, c0), caddc, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  imaddd(c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, c1), nat0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
  reim0b(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm readdcnnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[+]c1)∉ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (c0[+]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, (c0[+]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬(c0[+]c1)∈ ℝ)
  df-nel((c0[+]c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, (c0[+]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  bitrd(w0, (c0[+]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (Im `(c0[+]c1))= 0)
  syl(w0, ((c0[+]c1)∈ ℝ ↔(Im `(c0[+]c1))= 0), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℂ)
  addcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b((c0[+]c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, (Im `(c0[+]c1))= 0, c1 ∈ ℝ, ((Im ` c0)[+](Im ` c1))= 0, (Im ` c1)= 0)
  eqeq1d(((Im ` c0)[+](Im ` c1)), nat0, (Im ` c1), w0)
  eqtrd(((Im ` c0)[+](Im ` c1)), (Im ` c1), (0[+](Im ` c1)), w0)
  oveq1d((Im ` c0), caddc, (Im ` c1), nat0, w0)
  reim0d(c0, w0)
  addid2d((Im ` c1), w0)
  recnd((Im ` c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, w0)
  eqeq1d((Im `(c0[+]c1)), nat0, ((Im ` c0)[+](Im ` c1)), w0)
  imaddd(c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ∈ ℝ ↔(Im ` c1)= 0), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
  reim0b(c1)
}

blocks.name: resubcnnred
blocks.content: The difference of a real number and an imaginary number is not a real number. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm resubcnnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(cc, cr)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)))
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr)))
  df-nel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cmin, c1)), nat0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cmin, c1)), nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b(co(c0, cmin, c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cmin, c1)), nat0), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(cfv(cim, c0), cmin, cfv(cim, c1)), nat0), wceq(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(cfv(cim, c0), cmin, cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  syl6eqr(co(cfv(cim, c0), cmin, cfv(cim, c1)), cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), co(nat0, cmin, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cim, c0), cmin, cfv(cim, c1), nat0, w0)
  reim0d(c0, w0)
  df-neg(cfv(cim, c1))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cim, co(c0, cmin, c1)), nat0, co(cfv(cim, c0), cmin, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  imsubd(c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cim, c1), nat0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, c1), nat0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  reim0b(c1)
  negeq0d(cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  recnd(cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, w0)
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resubcnnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[-]c1)∉ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (c0[-]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, (c0[-]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬(c0[-]c1)∈ ℝ)
  df-nel((c0[-]c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, (c0[-]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  bitrd(w0, (c0[-]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (Im `(c0[-]c1))= 0)
  syl(w0, ((c0[-]c1)∈ ℝ ↔(Im `(c0[-]c1))= 0), (c0[-]c1)∈ ℂ)
  subcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b((c0[-]c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, (Im `(c0[-]c1))= 0, c1 ∈ ℝ, ((Im ` c0)[-](Im ` c1))= 0, -u((Im ` c1))= 0)
  eqeq1d(((Im ` c0)[-](Im ` c1)), nat0, -u((Im ` c1)), w0)
  syl6eqr(((Im ` c0)[-](Im ` c1)), -u((Im ` c1)), (0[-](Im ` c1)), w0)
  oveq1d((Im ` c0), cmin, (Im ` c1), nat0, w0)
  reim0d(c0, w0)
  df-neg((Im ` c1))
  eqeq1d((Im `(c0[-]c1)), nat0, ((Im ` c0)[-](Im ` c1)), w0)
  imsubd(c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  bitrd(w0, c1 ∈ ℝ, -u((Im ` c1))= 0, (Im ` c1)= 0)
  syl(w0, (c1 ∈ ℝ ↔(Im ` c1)= 0), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  reim0b(c1)
  negeq0d((Im ` c1), w0)
  recnd((Im ` c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, w0)
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
}

blocks.name: recnmulnred
blocks.content: The product of a real number and an imaginary number is not a real number. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm recnmulnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(cc, cr)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)))
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, wnel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr)))
  df-nel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  bicomd(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
  mulre(c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm recnmulnred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[×]c1)∉ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ 0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (c0[×]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifbd(c1, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, (c0[×]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c1 ∈ ℝ, ¬(c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ)
  df-nel((c0[×]c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  bicomd(w0, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  syl3anc(w0, (c1 ∈ ℝ ↔(c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ), c1 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ≠ 0)
  eldifad(c1, cc, cr, w0)
  mulre(c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: cndivrenred
blocks.content: The quotient of an imaginary number and a real number is not a real number. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cndivrenred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cr)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, nat0))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wnel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c0, cr)))
  eldifbd(c0, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, wnel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wn(wcel(c0, cr)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr)))
  df-nel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), nat0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc))
  divcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, wceq(cfv(cim, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), nat0), wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(cfv(cim, c0), cdiv, c1), nat0), wceq(cfv(cim, c0), nat0))
  diveq0ad(cfv(cim, c0), c1, w0)
  recnd(cfv(cim, c0), w0)
  imcld(c0, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  eqeq1d(cfv(cim, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), nat0, co(cfv(cim, c0), cdiv, c1), w0)
  imdivd(c0, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(cim, c0), nat0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  eldifad(c0, cc, cr, w0)
  reim0b(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cndivrenred(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[÷]c1)∉ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ 0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (c0[÷]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c0 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifbd(c0, cr, cc, w0)
  syl5bb(w0, (c0[÷]c1)∉ ℝ, ¬ c0 ∈ ℝ, ¬(c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ)
  df-nel((c0[÷]c1), cr)
  notbid(w0, (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  bitrd(w0, (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, (Im `(c0[÷]c1))= 0)
  syl(w0, ((c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ ↔(Im `(c0[÷]c1))= 0), (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℂ)
  divcld(c0, c1, w0)
  reim0b((c0[÷]c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, (Im `(c0[÷]c1))= 0, c0 ∈ ℝ, ((Im ` c0)[÷]c1)= 0, (Im ` c0)= 0)
  diveq0ad((Im ` c0), c1, w0)
  recnd((Im ` c0), w0)
  imcld(c0, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  eqeq1d((Im `(c0[÷]c1)), nat0, ((Im ` c0)[÷]c1), w0)
  imdivd(c0, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ↔(Im ` c0)= 0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eldifad(c0, cc, cr, w0)
  reim0b(c0)
}

blocks.name: sqrtnegnre
blocks.content: The square root of a negative number is not a real number. (Contributed by AV, 28-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sqrtnegnre(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wnel(cfv(csqrt, c0), cr))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wnel(cfv(csqrt, c0), cr), wn(wcel(cfv(csqrt, c0), cr)))
  eqneltrd(cfv(csqrt, c0), cr, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  eqtrd(cfv(csqrt, c0), co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0))), cfv(csqrt, cneg(cneg(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  fveq2d(csqrt, c0, cneg(cneg(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  eqcomd(c0, cneg(cneg(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wceq(cneg(cneg(c0)), c0))
  negnegd(c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  sqrtnegd(cneg(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  eqneltrd(co(ci, cmul, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0))), cr, co(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), cmul, ci), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  mulcomd(ci, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  sqrtcld(cneg(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  negcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wn(wcel(co(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), cmul, ci), cr)), wnel(co(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), cmul, ci), cr))
  recnmulnred(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), ci, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  resqrtcld(cneg(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  renegcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wb(wbr(c0, cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0))))
  eldifd(ci, cc, cr, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0)), wn(wcel(ci, cr)))
  inelr()
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wne(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wne(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wne(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))), wne(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0), wne(cneg(c0), nat0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wne(cneg(c0), nat0), wcel(nat0, cr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltne(nat0, cneg(c0))
  necon3bid(cneg(c0), nat0, cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))), wb(wceq(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), nat0), wceq(cneg(c0), nat0)), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)))
  renegcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)))
  3imtr3d(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c0)), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(c0, cle, nat0)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  ltle(c0, nat0)
  lt0neg1(c0)
  le0neg1(c0)
  sqrt00(cneg(c0))
  df-nel(co(cfv(csqrt, cneg(c0)), cmul, ci), cr)
  df-nel(cfv(csqrt, c0), cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sqrtnegnre(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0)→(sqrt ` c0)∉ ℝ)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0), (sqrt ` c0)∉ ℝ, ¬(sqrt ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  eqneltrd((sqrt ` c0), cr, (i[×](sqrt ` -u(c0))), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  eqtrd((sqrt ` c0), (i[×](sqrt ` -u(c0))), (sqrt ` -u(-u(c0))), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  fveq2d(csqrt, c0, -u(-u(c0)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  eqcomd(c0, -u(-u(c0)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0[<]0, -u(-u(c0))= c0)
  negnegd(c0, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  sqrtnegd(-u(c0), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  eqneltrd((i[×](sqrt ` -u(c0))), cr, ((sqrt ` -u(c0))[×]i), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
  mulcomd(ci, (sqrt ` -u(c0)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[<]0))
